tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: Candidate Release of the Orange Button Taxonomy 2018
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The Candiadate Release (CR) of Orange Button (Solar) Taxonomy developed by XBRL US and SunSpec Alliance for the Orange Button Initiative.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full Solar Entry Point
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for viewing the entire Orange Button Taxonomy. Documentation labels are included.
